pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo tattheva rājagahe vassaṃ vasanti, tattha hemantaṃ, tattha gimhaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:1.4: “āhundarikā bhikkhunīnaṃ disā andhakārā, na imāsaṃ disā pakkhāyantī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:1.5: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:1.6: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:1.8: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:1.9: “tena hi, bhikkhave, bhikkhunīnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapessāmi dasa atthavase paṭicca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:1.12: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:1.13: “Yā pana bhikkhunī vassaṃvuṭṭhā cārikaṃ na pakkameyya antamaso chappañcayojanānipi, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:2.1.6: purimaṃ vā temāsaṃ pacchimaṃ vā temāsaṃ vuṭṭhā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:2.1.7: “Cārikaṃ na pakkamissāmi antamaso chappañcayojanānipī”ti dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte āpatti pācittiyassa.
